name: The Magical Hats and their Wand
name_original: The Magical Hats and their Wand
description:
Oh boy, you have stolen a bunch of magical hats' favorite magical wand, and now they're out to get ya!

Lucky for you, the wand automatically fires large diamonds in the direction you are walking! And even better, everytime it fires, the hats' sentience turns on and off!

Controls:

 - Use WASD or Arrowkeys to move the player character, that's all!

 - It shoots by itself! Woohoo!

This game was part of the Nokia 3310 Game Jam, with restrictions towards making the game look and feel like a game that could be played on the classic phone.
